attributes.action: provide a substantial fuel discount for pensioners recieving pension credits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To provide a substantial fuel and tv license discount for pensioners recieving pension credits to abolish the need for some pensioners to choose between eating and heating. Or alternatively increase the winter fuel subsidy to cover the full cost of 6 months fuel bills.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
